item.description:
After much discussion, many people will be away over Labor Day weekend so Sat, Sept 1 will not work.

Let's have Rose` and Pot Luck on Thursday, Aug 23 at my place in Hudson.
I'm not purchasing meats for this social so there will be NO cost.

Noelle has offered to coordinate the pot luck, so please email her at noelledion@msn.com.

As usual any salads,  veggies, desserts, pasta, appetizers, etc.

Please bring a bottle of Rose` from anyplace. You may want to purchase soon since the supply is disappearing.

As before, I'll bag 6 bottles and we can score them.
item.name: Rose` and Pot Luck
